snippet: Ronald O. Perelman and Larry Gagosian, friends for years as well as business partners, are now enemies in court.
abstract: Gallery mogul Larry Gagosian, after failing to persuade billionaire collector Ronald O Perelman to drop his lawsuit accusing Gagosian of cheating and losing his money over a bad art deal, files court papers attacking Perelman and asking for dismissal of case.
lead_paragraph: Ronald O. Perelman and Larry Gagosian, friends for years as well as business partners, are now enemies in court.

headline.seo: Larry Gagosian and Ronald Perelman in a New Legal Clash
headline.main: New Blow in Art Clash of Titans
headline.print_headline: New Blow In Art Clash Of Titans
